data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Dalarna, Sweden to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dalarna, Sweden
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 15,893 believers find a person of peace today among the 260,708 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Dalarna do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Dalarna, Sweden to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab, Sudanese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please give every church in the state of Dalarna a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Dalarna.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Dalarna, Sweden that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

location.name: Dalarna
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Swedish-speaking, Yazidi, Azerbaijani, Kurd, Kurmanji, Somali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, Swedish-speaking (15,000), Yazidi (4,200), Azerbaijani (2,200), Kurd, Kurmanji (11,000), Somali (46,000)
